TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AdCreatedEventHandler(object sender, AdCreatedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AdCreatedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AdCreatedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AdCreatedEventArgs)
public delegate void AdCreatedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AdCreatedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件在页上显示播发。The event is raised when the control displays an advertisement on the page. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它将获取与播发相关联的 URL 时控件得以创建，并将其显示在控件的下方。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement when the control gets created and displays it below the control. 此示例需要在以下示例中列出的 XML 文件 (Ads.xml)。This example requires the XML file (Ads.xml) listed in the example below. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含播发信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅属性类。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. [!code-xml[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/Common/App_Data/Ads.xml#2)] [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]
